EmailTemplate.name: Controlling indirect spends (1561580789.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Controlling indirect spends (1561580789.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Izabella,
My name is Liz Rust, I've spoken with Fiona Robertson and she has referred me to speak to you.
We are interested in a business partnership with Stylus, and have helped many organizations reduce their indirect spends.
Are you available for a brief phone call to discuss this further perhaps this Friday?
Please let me know when is the best time to reach you.
Best regards,
Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
